title: Critical Appraisal of Artificial Intelligence-Mediated Communication. (arXiv:2305.11897v1 [cs.HC])
abstract: Over the last two decades, technology use in language learning and teaching has significantly advanced and is now referred to as Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL). Recently, the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) into CALL has brought about a significant shift in the traditional approach to language education both inside and outside the classroom. In line with this book's scope, I explore the advantages and disadvantages of AI-mediated communication in language education. I begin with a brief review of AI in education. I then introduce the ICALL and give a critical appraisal of the potential of AI-powered automatic speech recognition (ASR), Machine Translation (MT), Intelligent Tutoring Systems (ITSs), AI-powered chatbots, and Extended Reality (XR). In conclusion, I argue that it is crucial for language teachers to engage in CALL teacher education and professional development to keep up with the ever-evolving technology landscape and improve their teaching effectivene

translated_title: 人工智能中介交流的关键评估
translated_abstract: 在过去的20年中，语言学习和教学中的技术应用得到了显著发展，现在被称为计算机辅助语言学习（CALL）。最近，将人工智能（AI）整合到CALL中，显著改变了语言教育在课堂内外的传统方法。在本文中，我探讨了AI中介交流在语言教育中的优缺点。我首先简要回顾了教育中的AI技术。然后，我介绍了ICALL，并对AI驱动的自动语音识别（ASR）、机器翻译（MT）、智能辅导系统（ITSs）、AI驱动的聊天机器人和扩展现实（XR）的潜力进行了关键评估。最后，我认为，语言教师积极参与CALL教师教育和专业发展至关重要，以跟上不断发展的技术景观并提高自己的教学效果。
tldr: 本文探讨了人工智能在语言教育中介交流的优缺点，并强调语言教师积极参与CALL教师教育和专业发展的重要性。
en_tdlr: This paper examines the pros and cons of artificial intelligence-mediated communication in language education and emphasizes the importance of language teachers actively participating in CALL teacher education and professional development.
